channel.name: CBeebies UK
channel.title: Peter Rabbit
channel.desc: The Tale of the Stolen Firewood. Animated series. When Peter, Lily and Benjamin go out to collect firewood, they soon find that not one but three predators are after some too.

channel.name: CBeebies UK
channel.title: Andy's Safari Adventures
channel.desc: Andy and the African Penguins. Preschool wildlife series. Andy jets off in his safari-mobile to Africa to meet some African penguin chicks.

channel.name: CBeebies UK
channel.title: Mojo Swoptops
channel.desc: Ice Scream. Betty the ice cream van can't stop, so the chase is on for Mojo and Bo.

channel.name: CBeebies UK
channel.title: Bluey
channel.desc: Space. Mackenzie, Jack and Rusty are playing astronauts on a mission to Mars.

channel.name: CBeebies UK
channel.title: Bluey
channel.desc: Barky Boats. Calypso has to explain to Bluey and Mackenzie that growing up can be hard.

channel.name: CBeebies UK
channel.title: Piripenguins
channel.desc: Nugget's Nuglets. Nugget annoys Pancake with constant demands while ill in bed. To say sorry, she makes him a special bracelet. But Nugget is upset when others get 'nuglets' too.

channel.name: CBeebies UK
channel.title: Topsy and Tim
channel.desc: Special Invitation. Live-action children's show. Topsy accidentally spoils the special birthday invitation Tim made for his best friend, so Mummy helps create an even better one.

channel.name: CBeebies UK
channel.title: Our Family Fun Shorts
channel.desc: Iona and Elba Make Ice Creams. Scoops and cones at the ready as Iona and Elba make some tasty ice creams.

channel.name: CBeebies UK
channel.title: Waffle the Wonder Dog
channel.desc: Waffle Explores. Preschool comedy drama series. Evie, Doug and their friends go out to play in their new ball pit, but Waffle can't join in because he's not toilet trained.

channel.name: CBeebies UK
channel.title: Puffin Rock
channel.desc: Silky's New Friend. Silky's new friend is a clever clam called Clementine.

channel.name: CBeebies UK
channel.title: JoJo & Gran Gran
channel.desc: It's Time for a Race. JoJo & Gran Gran have their own sports day, including an egg and spoon race.

channel.name: CBeebies UK
channel.title: Moon and Me
channel.desc: Dibillo's Bow Tie. Dibillo decides to wear his favourite bow tie for the day. Mr Onion is excited and takes Dibillo around the house to show everybody how smart he looks.

channel.name: CBeebies UK
channel.title: Clangers
channel.desc: Tiny's Lullaby. Stop-motion animation. Tiny's radio hat develops a fault, so she can't hear the Iron Chicken's lullaby. She makes up her own melody to sing to her friends instead.

channel.name: CBeebies UK
channel.title: In the Night Garden
channel.desc: Igglepiggle's Tiddle. Children's programme. A mysterious jet of water appears suddenly next to Igglepiggle. He is delighted to discover that he can control it by stamping his feet.

channel.name: CBeebies UK
channel.title: CBeebies Bedtime Stories at Glastonbury
channel.desc: Abigail Morris - Sam Francisco: King of the Disco. The Last Dinner Party's Abigail Morris reads the tale of Sam Francisco: King of the Disco.
